verbs.description: [ARG0: The North Korean leader] [V: grimaced] [ARG1: at Trump 's request to photographers to make him and Kim look thin as possible] .
The North Korean leader grimaced at Trump 's request to photographers to [V: make] [ARG1: him and Kim look thin as possible] .
The North Korean leader grimaced at Trump 's request to photographers to make [ARG0: him and Kim] [V: look] [ARG1: thin] [ARGM-MNR: as possible] .
